actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the deadlines applicable to filing petitions for compensation under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.
short_title: National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009

summary.text: National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to extend the limitation period for filing a petition to compensate a vaccine-related injury under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.

titles.title: National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009
To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the deadlines applicable to filing petitions for compensation under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.
